seo.title: Values that shape every partnership
seo.description: Gentle, ICF-aligned principles that keep each conversation calm, transparent, and culturally aware.

hero.title: Values that shape every partnership
intro: Gentle, ICF-aligned principles that keep each conversation calm, transparent, and culturally aware.

cards.title: Authenticity
body: ICF-aligned practice keeps agreements, data care, and supervision transparent.

cards.title: Gentleness
body: We keep a calm cadence so experimentation feels kind, slow enough, and sustainable.

cards.title: Structure
body: Clear agreements, review points, and data boundaries help every partnership stay grounded.

cards.title: Cultural sensitivity
body: Lived experience across Asia-Pacific and the UK keeps multilingual nuance and policy context in view.

sections.title: Ethics & boundaries
sections.lead: We anchor every engagement in the International Coaching Federation (ICF) Code of Ethics and document how data is cared for from day one.

cards.title: Set informed consent
body: Set informed consent, confidentiality boundaries, and escalation paths before sessions begin.

cards.title: Check accessibility
body: Check accessibility, safeguarding, and wellbeing every few sessions to adjust support early.

cards.title: Pause or refer
body: Pause or refer when therapeutic, legal, or crisis support is more appropriate than coaching.

cards.title: Data care
bullets: Store session notes in encrypted, access-controlled systems with time-bound retention.
Share summaries only with people named in the original agreement, never external parties without consent.
Delete recordings or artefacts immediately when they are no longer required for the coaching goal.
body: Review the ICF Code of Ethics to see the standards we commit to in every partnership.

sections.title: Boundaries we uphold
sections.lead: These commitments protect your agency, safety, and consent.

cards.title: What scope does coaching cover?
body: We stay future-focused and collaborative. When therapeutic or legal support is needed, we pause and signpost trusted professionals.

cards.title: How do you monitor ethics?
body: We follow the International Coaching Federation Code of Ethics and maintain supervision to stay accountable.

cards.title: What if accessibility needs change?
body: We revisit agreements every few sessions to check progress, accessibility, and safeguarding requirements.

cta.title: Ready to map your next step?
cta.body: Browse our coaching services or read the full coaching boundaries we uphold.
